page.title: 17FAIR OAK BUSINESS CONCERNS
page.content: Fair Oak has no industry. The largest businesses are a Transport/ Tipper hire company which also supplies gravels and soils and also the sandpit which is still being worked and has recently opened a sales section for building materials. Four garages provide petrol services and car sales. Many small businesses are run only by the owners from private homes and employ only two or three people. Most of the businesses offer a service such as plumbing, heating, electrical work, decorating, building and domestic repairs. Unusual businesses also run from private homes include a Funeral Director, Precision Engineering, Removals, Fencing, Pottery, Printing and a small nursery selling fruit, flowers and vegetables as well as a comprehensive range of saddlery.
